news.title: RTÉ: "Ireland will not take part in the 2026 Eurovision Song Contest if the participation of Israel goes ahead"
news.summary: "RTÉ feels that Ireland’s participation would be unconscionable given the ongoing and appalling loss of lives in Gaza," a statement from the broadcaster reads.

news.title: KNEECAP on course for first Top 40 hit on UK Albums Chart with Fine Art following release of new single
news.summary: The Irish rap trio released 'Sayōnara' on September 2. Listen to the track below.

news.title: Reactions pour in following the shooting death of Charlie Kirk
news.summary: Micheál Martin, Mel Gibson and Boy George were among the many public figures condemning the shooting.

news.title: Search Results release new single 'Excruciating Heights'
news.summary: They begin touring in Ireland on September 11.

news.title: Junior Brother: "You escape into something and that can drive you into a state of mind which is kind of hard to come out of"
news.summary: Kerry artist Ronan Kealy, aka Junior Brother, talks about the folklore, experimentation and modern influences that combined to create his latest opus, The End.

news.title: John Lennon’s killer denied parole for 14th time
news.summary: His next parole hearing is scheduled for February 2027

news.title: Gareth Quinn Redmond announces album Múscailte
news.summary: Listen to the title track below.

news.title: Robert Sheehan, Aisling Bea and Barry Ward to star in Netflix adaptation of Grown Ups
news.summary: The series is based off the 2020 novel by Irish author Marian Keyes.

news.title: Bob Vylan to bring We Won't Go Quietly tour to Vicar Street
news.summary: Tickets go on sale tomorrow at 10a.m.

news.title: Remembering Daniel Johnston: "I identify with Casper. He always had a good attitude and he was always helping people. That’s the way I feel I should be"
news.summary: On this day six years ago, singer-songwriter Daniel Johnston died of a suspected heart attack at his home in Texas. To mark his anniversary, we're looking back at his classic interview with Tara Brady...
